titleStmt.title: Aurea dicta. The gratious words of King Charles I. of glorious memory: for the Protestant religion of the Church of England. / Collected out of [Eikon basilike].
Eikon basilike. Selections.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. Lichfield for John Barksdale, Bookseller in Cirencester,

notesStmt.note: The words "Eikon basilike" in title are printed in Greek characters.
Imperfect: faded, with slight loss of text.
"Eikon basilike" has been variously attrib. to King Charles I, and John Gauden.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
